all_the_buzz.utilities.error_handler module

class all_the_buzz.utilities.error_handler.ResponseCode(error_tag: str = '', data: Any | None = None)

Bases: object

This class wraps a detailed HTTP response code with a custom message and added data and automatically logs this result

get_data() → Any | None
get_error_code() → int
get_error_tag() → str
get_message() → str
get_success() → bool
to_http_response() → tuple[int, dict]

Creates an HTTP response to send back to the user

Returns:

a coupled a tuple of the response code and a JSONified version of the information stored in ResponseCode

Return type:

response (tuple[int, dict])
